tool_description: Counts words, characters, paragraphs, and sentences in journal entries, providing detailed text statistics.

entry_text.description: The journal entry text to analyze for word count and statistics

include_spaces.description: Whether to include spaces in character count

error_messages: Empty entry text: Provide non-empty text content for word counting.
usage: Provide entry_text to get comprehensive text statistics. Set include_spaces to control character counting method. Returns detailed word count and text analysis metrics.

word_count.description: Total number of words in the entry

character_count.description: Total number of characters (with or without spaces)

paragraph_count.description: Number of paragraphs in the entry

sentence_count.description: Number of sentences in the entry
